entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Greater Napanee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:44 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.4°C

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
